items.title: Elon Musk to go ahead with lawsuit against OpenAI despite nonprofit control statement, lawyer says
items.description: Elon Musk plans to proceed with his highly watched lawsuit against OpenAI, his lawyer Marc Toberoff said on Monday, hours after the AI startup dialed back its earlier plan to remove control by its...

items.title: OpenAI agrees to buy Windsurf for about $3 billion, Bloomberg News reports
